Package com.github.ylc.midi

Class MidiPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.github.ylc.midi.MidiPlayer
public class MidiPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
An object used to create sequence of sounds for player to play random sounds.
Since:
2020-08-08
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Yue Chen (yuelchen)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MidiPlayer()
    Constructor Initialize the sequencer for this player and initialize collection for sequences data structure.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean isPlayerSet()
    Returns whether or not sequencer player was successfully set by constructor.
    boolean loadNewSequence​(java.lang.String name, int noteCount)
    Creates a new sequence of tracks based off the track count number and then add the new sequence to the collection of sequences with given name.
    void playSequence​(java.lang.String name)
    Plays the sequence of track if correspong track name exists in collection of sequences.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MidiPlayer

      public MidiPlayer()
      Constructor Initialize the sequencer for this player and initialize collection for sequences data structure. Catches MidiUnavailableException and SecurityException in the event Midi player is unable to initialize sequencer or data structure. Logs the failure message as system output.

  • Method Details

    • isPlayerSet

      public boolean isPlayerSet()
      Returns whether or not sequencer player was successfully set by constructor.
      Returns:
      true if sequencer was successfully set.

    • playSequence

      public void playSequence​(java.lang.String name)
      Plays the sequence of track if correspong track name exists in collection of sequences. Catches InvalidMidiDataException and InterruptedException in the event MIDI data passed invalid data or thread sleep isn't able to execute for waiting before printing out system finish message.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the sequence that will be played.

    • loadNewSequence

      public boolean loadNewSequence​(java.lang.String name, int noteCount)
      Creates a new sequence of tracks based off the track count number and then add the new sequence to the collection of sequences with given name. Catches InvalidMidiDataException in the event MIDI data passed invalid data. Returns whether or not a new sequence was created.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the new sequence to be mapped.
      noteCount - the number of notes for track.
      Returns:
      true if a new sequence was successfully added to collection.
